name: Sakimichan LORA [18.5mb]
description:
This is a LoRA for Sakimichan. Yes there are already some LoRA out there, but this one is smaller and in my opinion more accurate (so accurate in fact that the sakimichan signature is almost baked in lol...).

Its perfect for capturing anything that Sakimi would create, and in that sense, is very hard to prompt outside those parameters (anything too unique or inhuman like actually wanting multiple body parts).

Can do both men and women. And of course easily capable of doing NSFW.

As for the signature that I mentioned before, It is rather pesky, and usually has to be inpainted (albeit quite easily). You can try some negative 'signature, artist signature' prompts, it may help, but mostly you may need to reduce the lora weight if its too frequent and annoying.

The model I used to train, and also for the images is AbyssOrangemixv2

A weighting of 0.7 is plenty, but you can push it further if you would like.

Works a like a charm with Controlnet, which you can see from some of my images.

Enjoy.


If you have any LoRA requests and wouldnt mind buying me a Hot Chocolate, please consider going to my page. https://www.buymeacoffee.com/JohnStinko
